divs: Sighting DetailsOver 4 and James st super bright object over KC bottoms at the cloud line lasted 30 seconds shape resembled a half moon but the size of about 500 to 1000 in diameter. It disappeared into the sky. This object was about 200 feet south of I70 and as bright as the sun at 5pm today
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Kansas City
There were no other sightings in Kansas City on or around September 16th 2011
